application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to ref: 24/03224/FUL: hard surfacing (6), level (7), materials (10), enclosure (11), secured by design (15), glazing (16), biodiversity and landscaping (18), lighting (19), cycle (21), vehicle charging (22) and Refuse(23) for the erection of a three storey block of 6 x self-contained flats with associated parking and amenity space.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: LHA Maximum Height Level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 150 metres in height (492.1 feet).
LLA Maximum height level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 150 metres in height (492.1 feet)
CILRES CIL ZONE: Higher Rate - RATE: Â£120 per square metre

decision_conditions: The information provided in respect of discharging condition conditions 6, 7, 10, 11, 15, 16, 18, 19, 21, 22 and 23 is considered insufficient and inadequate, thereby considered unacceptable and contrary to the National Planning Policy Framework (2024), Policies D4, D5, G6, SI12, T5 and T6.1 of the London Plan (2021), CP21, CP25, CPP28, CP29, CP30, CP36 of the Enfield Core Strategy (2010), DMD6, DMD8, DMD9, DMD37, DMD40, DMD44, DMD45, DMD47, DMD59, DMD 61, DMD81 of the Enfield Development Management Document (2014)
